timeline.message:
RDM-9231 Fix Swagger groups (#1053)

* RDM-9231 Fix Swagger groups

* Update Jenkinsfile_CNP

* Update values.preview.template.yaml

Co-authored-by: Hemanth Potipati <hrpotipati@gmail.com>

Revert "removed es and ls dependencies" (#1050)

* Revert "removed es and ls dependencies because failing master build during re…"

* disabled elastic search by default (enabled on preview)

* Bumping chart version

Co-authored-by: hmcts-jenkins-cdm <62421877+hmcts-jenkins-cdm[bot]@users.noreply.github.com>
Co-authored-by: Hemanth Potipati <hrpotipati@gmail.com>
enhance pipeline logic per build type
enable ES tests on higher env builds
Update build.gradle

Merge pull request #1063 from hmcts/enhance-pipeline-logic-per-build-type

Merging this to just facilitate fixing of the failing build, by enhancing the pipeline logic per build type.
There will be a separate ticket to resolve the failing build on master, which is due to another problem on AAT around def store performance.

RDM-9258: Release RDM-8842 with CI/CD (initialise)

   [RDM-9258](https://tools.hmcts.net/jira/browse/RDM-9258)

wire with def stor and user profile on aat
Create renovate.json
Update Chart.yaml
Delete requirements.yaml

RDM-8842: Increment Assigned User Count of Cases when Assigned to Users.

First working draft before refactoring.

RDM-8842 Increment Assigned User Count (refactor)

   [RDM-8842](https://tools.hmcts.net/jira/browse/RDM-8842)

Refactor:
 * convert caseReference to caseId upfront rather than in two locations.
 * group by case ID first so conversion is only required once.
 * also allows it to fail fast when a case has not been found.

RDM-8842 Increment Assigned User Count (test)

   [RDM-8842](https://tools.hmcts.net/jira/browse/RDM-8842)

Unit and Integration tests for changes under RDM-8842.

RDM-8842 Increment Assigned User Count (refactor)

   [RDM-8842](https://tools.hmcts.net/jira/browse/RDM-8842)

Use separate data models for the Add and Get APIs so the new
 `organisation_id` property used only by the Add API doesn't pollute
 the Get API's swagger definition.

RDM-8842 Increment Assigned User Count (FTA)

   [RDM-8842](https://tools.hmcts.net/jira/browse/RDM-8842)

Change 4th BEFTA account choice but keep to same jurisdiction.

timeline.bodyText: Should ELASTIC_SEARCH_FTA_ENABLED be on or off in Demo?
timeline.author: mattnayler
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -68,34 +75,49 @@ def vaultOverrides = [
     'preview' : 'aat',
     'spreview': 'saat'
 ]
-// Vars needed for functional and smoke tests run against AKS
+// vars needed for functional tests
+// Assume a feature build branched off 'develop', with dependencies develop-to-develop.
+env.DEFINITION_STORE_HOST = "http://ccd-definition-store-api-${definitionStoreDevelopPr}.service.core-compute-preview.internal".toLowerCase()
+
+// Other env variables needed for BEFTA.
 env.IDAM_URL = "https://idam-api.aat.platform.hmcts.net"
 env.S2S_URL = "http://rpe-service-auth-provider-aat.service.core-compute-aat.internal"
 env.BEFTA_S2S_CLIENT_ID = "ccd_gw"
 env.OAUTH2_CLIENT_ID = "ccd_gateway"
 env.OAUTH2_REDIRECT_URI = "https://www-ccd.aat.platform.hmcts.net/oauth2redirect"
 env.DM_STORE_BASE_URL = "http://dm-store-aat.service.core-compute-aat.internal"
-env.DEFINITION_STORE_HOST = "http://ccd-definition-store-api-pr-575.service.core-compute-preview.internal"
-env.BEFTA_RESPONSE_HEADER_CHECK_POLICY="JUST_WARN"
-env.ELASTIC_SEARCH_FTA_ENABLED = "true"
+env.RD_PROFESSIONAL_API_BASE_URL = "http://rd-professional-api-aat.service.core-compute-aat.internal"
+env.BEFTA_RESPONSE_HEADER_CHECK_POLICY="JUST_WARN" // Temporary workaround for platform changes: turn BEFTA header checks to warning mode
+env.ELASTIC_SEARCH_FTA_ENABLED = "false"

replies.bodyText: This is solely for FTAs. Please don't care. As FTAs are are already disabled on demo.
replies.author: MSancaktutar
